content: Kwik-Con+ Phillips countersunk flat head screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (carbon steel, Phillips countersunk flat head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Also available with Torx® flat head (countersunk) and Torx® hex head for more secure driving and no bit slippage Stainless steel fasteners available in select sizes (or through our special department) Matched tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required to set these screw anchors Applications Fastening to concrete, block, brick, and masonry Fastening window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing handrails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Countersunk Phillips Bit size: PH3 Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Countersunk Phillips | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 2260100 - Screw Anchor Kwik-Con+ 1/4x1-3/4 PFH - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KC 1/4 x 1 3/4 PFH Concrete screw ctd. - 3654653 - KWIK-CON+ 1/4 x 1 3/4 PFH MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: -
